Package PoolGame

Class Game

java.lang.Object
PoolGame.Game
public class Game extends Object
The game class that runs the game

      Reloads/sets up the config reader with the according path and boolena isResourceDir
      Parameters:
      configReader - The configReader to reload

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()

      public void reset()
      Reset the game: resets score and time.

    • checkMemento

      public boolean checkMemento(PoolTableMemento memento, List<Ball> currentBalls)
      Check memento if the memento's state and the current Balls are the same
      Parameters:
      memento - The PoolTableMemento instance
      currentBalls - The pool table's list of balls.
      Returns:
      Returns if the memento's state and the current Balls are the same

    • tick

      public void tick()
      Code to execute every tick.

    • setUpKeyboardFunctions

      public void setUpKeyboardFunctions()
      sets up pressing of keyboard keys action that does: Reset the scene to change level and implement undo function and removing of balls (Cheating)

    • removeBallsFromColour

      public void removeBallsFromColour(String colour)
      Cheating function. Disables all the balls of the specified colour. Updates the score as well.
      Parameters:
      colour - The colour of the ball(s) to remove.

    • checkAllAtRest

      public boolean checkAllAtRest()
      Check if the balls are at rest
      Returns:
      Return true if all balls are at rest.

    • setStateFromMemento

      public void setStateFromMemento(PoolTableMemento memento)
      Resets the current balls, time and score.
      Parameters:
      memento - The memento to set the state to.

    • saveCurrentState

      public PoolTableMemento saveCurrentState()
      Returns:
      Saves and returns current PoolTableMemento.

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      In the ball observer class, when ball falls, get score here.
      Returns:
      Returns the current game score.

    • setScore

      public void setScore(int score)
      Sets the current score and reset the Score Text.
      Parameters:
      score - The Game's curent score;

    • renderTime

      public void renderTime()
      Renders the timer. If seconds reach 60 seconds, increase seconds and reset seconds to 0.

    • resetTime

      public void resetTime()
      Sets the time/milliseconds to 0.
